data.name: Townframe
data.detailed_description:
A short puzzle game where you create little towns and solve riddles
given by people who once lived in these towns.

Game:

  • generate a whole delicious town at once
  • make individual buildings or trees
  • solve puzzles given by the people who once lived in these towns
  • the characters are very cool
  • listen to the soundscapes of these towns !? ... (maybe a riddle)
  • take awesome pictures of your towns via a photo mode and use them for what ever you want
  • and unlock even more tools to explore all the hidden things in these towns
  • r e l a x & e x p l o r e



A tool that let you make wind which influence some objects in these towns.

All tools are working in every town.
That means that even in towns where you don't need the wind tool you can use it and can discover new things.

data.short_description: Townframe is a little town maker puzzle game where you recreate towns from people's memories. These people give you puzzles and to solve them you can use different tools like one that makes wind and more. Get coins and unlock more tools to explore even more hidden things in the world of Townframe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
